str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.

parse: Verb - Aorist Optative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pleres; to make replete, i.e. to cram, level up, or to furnish, satisfy, execute, finish, verify, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
Joy, gladness, a source of joy. From chairo; cheerfulness, i.e. Calm delight.
And, even, also, namely.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From perissos; to superabound, be in excess, be superfluous; also to cause to superabound or excel.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
Wind, breath, spirit.
